tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalHealthData (
  country_name VARCHAR(50),
  city_name VARCHAR(50),
  pollution_level FLOAT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  public_health_issue VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Environmental_Factors (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  pollution_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Public_Health (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease VARCHAR,
  cases INT,
  deaths INT
)

CREATE TABLE Correlations (
  environmental_factor_id INT,
  public_health_id INT,
  correlation_coefficient FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE correlations (
    correlation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    factor_id INT,
    issue_id INT,
    country_id INT,
    correlation_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (factor_id) REFERENCES environmental_factors(factor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (issue_id) REFERENCES public_health_issues(issue_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (country_id) REFERENCES countries(country_id)
);
